channel.title: Kronnick #317
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://www.kronnick.com/images/artakus/artakus_logo.gif[/img]
I don't know what to say, the project was launched a month and a hafl ago. I have alot more info on my forum, the link will be released when the server is done. Which will most likeley not happen until next month. I can't be fucked to find the pictures of when i finnished rendering and such, so this is just ingame content, and such.
If my old SabsabiOnlineChannel YouTube account hadn't been closed, i could show you a video of my previous range system, the server used to be called Neitiznot #317
I don't know if this is worth posting. But before my NPC dialogue system was pretty messed up, so i rewrote all the methods and this was the outcome:
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/33ff04n.jpg[/img]
Teleporting [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/52i934.gif[/img]
Player following(50%) [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2054208.gif[/img]
Player Vs Player [IMG]http://www.kronnick.com/combat.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/17tx0j.jpg[/img]
Player Vs Npc [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/34z0dxf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/k9702o.jpg[/img]
Trading [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/fbxjsp.jpg[/img]
[b]Chaos Elemental[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dJt6Uig3ZPA
[b]Herblore[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EQXN_IUgitg
////Old pics from neitiznot [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/1zexu0l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/24glmrm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/4r7rsw.png[/img] [/CENTER]

item.title: Kronnick #317
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:7, topic:376191”][quote author=TimeTM link=topic=472124.msg3452840#msg3452840 date=1293873841]

Fix teles and combat

If you could tell me what’s wrong with it, i’d be more than happy to fix it.
[/quote]Teleport graphic and anim completely out of sync.

Defender should play def anim as soon as attacker plays attack anim
Should be a system in place to stop you from playing def anim in certain situations (which causes you to hit while playing def anim)
Should be a system in place to stop weapon switching until the attack anim is over (btw it’s 2 tickables long for every anim)[/quote]

Thanks alot, i appreciate it.

Read full topic

[/quote]

If you could tell me what’s wrong with it, i’d be more than happy to fix it.[/quote]Teleport graphic and anim completely out of sync.

Defender should play def anim as soon as attacker plays attack anim
Should be a system in place to stop you from playing def anim in certain situations (which causes you to hit while playing def anim)
Should be a system in place to stop weapon switching until the attack anim is over (btw it’s 2 tickables long for every anim)

item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:

[/quote]Nothing is ever good enough for you.

Canownueazy, i would really love to hear what’s wrong with it. I am strifing for perfect combat atleast.
